---
title: "watch_logs_and_wait"
description: "Asynchronously execute a task with the agent"
---

This is currently a wrapper around the synchronous run method. In future versions, this might be implemented as a true async operation


## Parameters

</ParamField>

<ParamField path="session_id" type="str">

</ParamField>

<ParamField path="max_steps" type="int">

</ParamField>

<ParamField path="log" type="bool">
   (default: True)
</ParamField>

## Returns

[`AgentStatusResponse`](../misc/agentstatusresponse): The response from the completed agent execution.
